metadata.title: AgriShop - Your Complete Agriculture Solution
metadata.description: Government approved agriculture shop providing fertilizers, seeds, pesticides, and gardening solutions.

hero.title: Your Complete Agriculture Solution
hero.subtitle: We provide high-quality fertilizers, seeds, pesticides, and gardening solutions for all your agricultural needs.

sections.productsDescription: We offer a wide range of high-quality agricultural products to meet all your farming and gardening needs.
sections.servicesDescription: Professional services to help you achieve the best results in your agricultural endeavors.

productDescriptions.fertilizers: High-quality fertilizers for all types of crops and plants.
productDescriptions.seeds: Hybrid, paddy, wheat, and fodder crop seeds.
productDescriptions.pesticides: Effective pesticides and herbicides for crop protection.
productDescriptions.organic: Organic manures and plant nutrition products.

serviceDescriptions.terraceGarden: Complete solutions for setting up beautiful and productive terrace gardens.
serviceDescriptions.floristGardening: Specialized products and advice for florist gardening.
serviceDescriptions.homeVegetable: Everything you need to grow vegetables at home.

aboutSection.paragraph1: AgriShop is a government-approved and licensed agriculture shop dedicated to providing farmers and gardening enthusiasts with the best products and services.
aboutSection.paragraph2: With years of experience in the agriculture industry, we understand the needs of farmers and provide tailored solutions.

contactSection.subtitle: Have questions or need assistance? Contact us today!

footer.aboutText: Government approved agriculture shop providing complete farming and gardening solutions.
footer.newsletterText: Stay updated with our latest products and offers.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Professional agricultural and gardening services tailored to your needs
servicesPage.categoriesSubtitle: We offer a wide range of specialized services to meet all your agricultural and gardening needs

terrace.title: Terrace Garden Setup
terrace.description: Transform your terrace into a lush, productive garden space with our complete terrace gardening solutions. Our experts will design and implement a garden that suits your space and preferences.
features: Custom design based on your terrace space and sunlight conditions
Selection of suitable plants for terrace conditions
Installation of lightweight, durable containers and planters
Setup of efficient irrigation and drainage systems

professional.title: Professional Gardening Services
professional.description: Our team of experienced gardeners provides comprehensive professional gardening services for homes, businesses, and institutions in Banaras and surrounding areas.
features: Specialized care for ornamental plants and trees

hydroponics.title: Hydroponics System Setup
hydroponics.description: Embrace modern farming techniques with our hydroponics system setup services. We design, install, and maintain soilless growing systems for efficient and clean cultivation.
features: Custom hydroponic system design for your space
Training on system operation and maintenance

greenhouse.title: Greenhouse Setup and Management
greenhouse.description: Create the perfect growing environment with our greenhouse setup services. We offer customized greenhouse solutions for year-round cultivation regardless of external weather conditions.

aboutPage.title: About AgriShop
aboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted partner in agriculture since 1995
aboutPage.storyParagraph1: Founded in 1995 in the heart of Banaras, AgriShop began as a small store serving local farmers with essential agricultural supplies. Over the years, we have grown into a comprehensive agricultural solution provider while maintaining our commitment to quality and customer service.
aboutPage.storyParagraph2: Located near the fertile banks of the Ganges, we understand the unique agricultural needs of the Banaras region. Our team consists of agricultural experts, experienced gardeners, and knowledgeable staff who are passionate about helping farmers and gardening enthusiasts achieve the best results.
aboutPage.storyParagraph3: Today, AgriShop is proud to be a government-approved and licensed agricultural shop offering a wide range of products and services, from traditional farming supplies to modern hydroponics and greenhouse solutions.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide farmers and gardening enthusiasts with high-quality agricultural products and expert services that promote sustainable farming practices and enhance productivity.
aboutPage.visionText: To be the leading agricultural solution provider in Eastern Uttar Pradesh, known for innovation, quality, and commitment to sustainable farming practices.
aboutPage.valuesDescription: These core principles guide everything we do at AgriShop

values.title: Quality
values.description: We are committed to providing only the highest quality products and services to our customers.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We promote sustainable farming practices that protect the environment and ensure long-term productivity.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously seek innovative solutions to address the evolving challenges in agriculture.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.description: We prioritize understanding and meeting the unique needs of each customer.

aboutPage.achievementsDescription: Milestones we've reached in our journey

achievements.title: Government Recognition
achievements.description: Received official recognition from the UP State Agricultural Department for our contribution to promoting modern farming techniques.

achievements.title: 10,000+ Farmers Served
achievements.description: Proud to have served over 10,000 farmers and gardening enthusiasts across Banaras and surrounding regions.
